title: High Plat LFT
body:
Hello,

I'm looking to join a team that plays a relatively fair amount

I currently don't 'main' a position as I am able to play a fair few champions in each role and tend to jump around a lot.

I am able to play afternoons on Monday, Wednesday, Thursday and Friday. As well as all-day Saturday and most of Sunday.

I tend to play long-range mages in mid such as {{champion:101}}  and {{champion:161}} .
Tanky initiators in top such as {{champion:57}}  and {{champion:54}} .
Gank heavy jungle style on {{champion:421}} , {{champion:113}} , {{champion:106}} 

{{champion:104}} , {{champion:81}} , {{champion:67}} , {{champion:236}}  for ADC
{{champion:412}} , {{champion:40}} , {{champion:201}} , {{champion:1}}  for support.

I'm open to practice any new champions to play in any role as I have a decent grasp on most
